TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBindingCollectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because DataBindings editing is launched via a DesignerActionList instead of the property grid. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: Proporciona un convertidor de tipos para objetos .

span.span: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Llama a este convertidor de tipos base método para todos los tipos de destino excepto , para que una cadena vacía ("") se devuelve.This type converter calls the base method for all destination types except , for which an empty string ("") is returned. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ConvertTo (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, culture As CultureInfo, value As Object, destinationType As Type) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ ConvertTo(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture, System::Object ^ value, Type ^ destinationType);

param.name: context
param.span: Un objeto que indica el componente o control al que pertenece la colección de enlaces de datos.

span.span: An that indicates the component or control to which the data binding collection belongs.

param.name: culture
param.span: Un objeto que se puede utilizar para proporcionar información adicional de referencia cultural.

span.span: A that can be used to provide additional culture information.

param.name: value
param.span: Objeto que se va a convertir.

param.name: destinationType
param.span: Tipo al que se va a convertir.

summary.span: Convierte una colección de enlaces de datos en el tipo especificado.

span.span: Converts a data binding collection to the specified type.

returns.span: El objeto que se obtiene tras la conversión de tipos.

span.span: The object produced by the type conversion.

returns.span: Si el parámetro es de tipo , este método devuelve una cadena vacía ("").

span.span: If the parameter is of type , this method returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método devuelve una cadena vacía si el `destinationType` parámetro es de tipo .This method returns an empty string if the `destinationType` parameter is of type . En caso contrario, este método llama a la método de la base de clase.Otherwise this method calls the method of the base class.
